attempts.raw_output:
The agent found the root cause. Here's the triage:

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"Fully encrypted confCons.xml silently loses encryption on upgrade because the save path reads EncryptCompleteConnectionsFile from app settings (default false) instead of honoring the FullFileEncryption attribute already present in the loaded XML file.","priority":"P1-security","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/Connections/XmlConnectionsSaver.cs","mRemoteNG/Tree/Root/RootNodeInfo.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Xml/XmlConnectionsDeserializer.cs"],"approach":"When loading, propagate the FullFileEncryption XML attribute into RootNodeInfo so it persists in the connection tree model. In XmlConnectionsSaver, use the loaded model's encryption flag (OR'd with the app setting) instead of only the app setting, ensuring a file that was fully encrypted stays encrypted even if the user setting wasn't migrated."}
```
